title: 2 million users and counting: DVLA’s Driver and vehicles account is growing!

content.text: We recently celebrated the one year anniversary of the Driver and vehicles account and since its launch in August last year, it has continued to evolve with more DVLA services added.

More than 2 million motorists have already signed up to the account and are making use of the various services readily available. It’s a 24 hour online service, so you can access it at a time and place that suits you.

The account has already been making things quicker and easier, allowing you to view all your driver and vehicles details in one place for the first time. You can choose to receive vehicle tax reminders by text or email, opt out of receiving paper reminders in the post, view vehicle details such as when your MOT expires, and check your vehicle tax rates. Commercial drivers can also view CPC and tachograph information.

Since our first blog, we’ve added the option to renew your photocard driving licence and apply for a first provisional licence through your account. These are 2 of our highest volume driving licence transactions. Another 2 services have also been added to the account recently, offering even more functionality, these include:
Change the photo on your driving licence

Once signed up to the Driver and vehicles account, you can choose to change the photo on your full or provisional driving licence photocard at any time. This can be done easily, simply by renewing your licence and uploading your own photo through the account whenever you choose.

If you need to share your driving licence information with car insurance companies, car hire companies or if you drive a vehicle as part of your employment, you can now get a check code through the Driver and vehicles account.

There were 18.9 million check codes generated last year through our existing GOV.UK service. Getting a check code through the Driver and vehicles account is a quicker and easier process, as your details are already in your account. If you share check codes regularly, by using the account you will no longer need to complete identity verification each time.
